title: Modern Mangalsutra - Double Strand with Diamond Pendants
features: Delicate double-layered chain design featuring alternating black beads and a slim rose gold chain. The first strand features a singular CZ diamond pendant, while the second strand has a larger floral-shaped CZ diamond pendant. Designed for daily wear with a modern minimalist aesthetic.
occasions: casual events. A modern take on traditional mangalsutra designs suitable for contemporary brides.
description: This modern Mangalsutra offers a contemporary twist on the traditional symbol of marriage. The minimalist design and delicate rose gold chain make it ideal for daily wear, while the sparkling CZ diamond pendants add a touch of elegance. Its lightweight construction ensures comfortable wear throughout the day. This piece combines tradition with modern style.
